name: Civil Servant
description:
Approve and deny the demands of incoming cultists in this 2D bureaucratic game. Make sure their requests don't clash with your boss' orders, and don't test their patience too much, these cultists can be quite persistent, so do your best to delay the Inevitable One's coming...

This game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 50 with the theme "Delay the inevitable" and was inspired by Papers, Please and Death and Taxes.

How to play
  • Move your mouse to the upper corner of the screen to look up, move it to the lower corner of the screen to look down
  • Hold the left mouse button to drag objects around
  • While holding the left mouse button, either click the right mouse button to use stamps and staplers, or hold the right mouse button to increase the paper size
